name: Zulaport Cutthroat
text: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor: "Eldrazi? Ha! Try walking through Zulaport at night with your pockets full. Now *that's* dangerous."
originalText: Whenever Zulaport Cutthroat or another creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

rulings.text: If Zulaport Cutthroat dies at the same time as another creature you control, its ability triggers for that creature.
In a Two-Headed Giant game, Zulaport Cutthroat’s ability causes the opposing team to lose 2 life and you to gain 1 life.

foreignNames.name: ズーラポートの殺し屋
